channel.title: Questions about LKRG and Debian's hardening-runtime package
channel.description:
What are the differences between [Debian's](https://packages.debian.org/bullseye/hardening-runtime) `hardening-runtime` [package](https://salsa.debian.org/corsac/hardening-runtime/-/blob/debian/master/debian/README.Debian) and Kicksecure's [LKRG](https://lkrg.org)?
Can I use both? I'm using this for a host machine.

item.title: Questions about LKRG and Debian's hardening-runtime package
